indexPage.title: Enter Your Winning Code
indexPage.description: If you have won, you should have received a winning code.
indexPage.scanningDescription: Please wait while we verify your code.
indexPage.chooseColorPrompt: Click below to choose a color.
indexPage.selectColorDescription: Choose your preferred color for your iPhone 16.
indexPage.agreementText: Before we can hand you the receipt to pick up your iPhone at a nearby store, you must pass a human verification test. In our last giveaway, we found that over half of the prizes went to people who programmed bots to participate multiple times and then sell the iPhones. The human test is simple: it's like downloading a free game and playing it for a while or filling out some surveys, depending on the device type, to prove that you are human and not a programmed robot.
indexPage.invalidCodeDescription: The entered code is incorrect. Please try again.
